item.title: New blog
item.description:
Hi i have a blog now
Don't expect frequent posts in here but there will occasionally be some

item.title: Dark reader incompat
item.description:
Turns out dark reader can mess up the style of the website
so if you have it installed, (and you probably noticed that it looks weird) disable it for this website

item.title: Generic website update 1
item.description:
Added some technical information about the website
Fixed info page not having an icon
Added projects page

item.title: major mistake
item.description:
I somehow managed to forget the keys to my house today and had to wait for parents to come
It certainly was a chilling experience
